answers.text:
Hi Pam, 
here are a few resources that will hopefully help your member answer their question. 
Here is a white paper written about local government's role in community health and food access which touches upon similar issues to your member's questions. http://bookstore.icma.org/freedocs/E43398.pdf
Here are the survey results from a past ICMA survey about what local governments are doing in terms of food policies in their communities. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/304510
Unfortunately I was not able to find any documents or blog posts related specifically to the local government providing gift cards for food to community members but I believe these two documents might provide a general idea of how other local governments are dealing with similar issues. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
